MAN.TITLE: get_function_path
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: get source file path of a library function

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a string, the name of the function
: a string, the absolute pathname of the function source file (.sci) or [].

DESCRIPTION.P: Given the name of a function get_function_path returns the absolute pathname of the function source file if the function is defined in a Scilab library (see lib) or [] if name does not match any library function.
